definition.simple_html:
template <typename Visitor>
void customVisit(Visitor&& v) const
definition.simple_raw:
template <typename Visitor>
void customVisit(Visitor&& v) const
definition.detailed_html:
template <typename Visitor>
inline void customVisit(Visitor&& v) const
definition.detailed_raw:
template <typename Visitor>
inline void customVisit(Visitor&& v) const

description.detailed_html:
Users should provide a visitor with the following methods 

struct Visitor {
  void assign(Number);
  void clear();
  void add(Number);
}

For example: 

auto patch = I32Patch::createClear();
patch += 10;

patch.customVisit(v) will invoke the following methods 

v.clear();
v.add(10);
description.brief_html: This API uses Visitor pattern to describe how patch will be applied. When a certain operation will be performed by the patch, the corresponding method (that matches the write API) will be called.

brief_html: This API uses Visitor pattern to describe how patch will be applied. When a certain operation will be performed by the patch, the corresponding method (that matches the write API) will be called.
